short_summary: basin dredging at Transport Canada's ferry terminal
description: basin dredging at Transport Canada's ferry terminal facility in Saint John, Saint John County, NB. The project work is to include the dredging of Class 'B' material in the basin. Dredge material is to be disposed at the designated disposal at sea site in accordance with all conditions of the Disposal at Sea permit.",
tags: Saint John, Saint John County, NB
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title and Details

* **Title (English)**: Basin Dredging and Disposal at Sea (Saint John Ferry Terminal, NB)
* **Title (French)**: Dragage du bassin et immersion en mer (terminal de traversier de Saint John, N.-B.)
* **Notice Reference Number**: WS4360944353-Doc4363617375
* **Number of Amendments**: 3
* **Invitation Number**: WS4360944353

### Public Notice Details

* **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 9, 2024 @ 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Amendment Date**: January 8, 2024

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 11, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024 (unless otherwise specified)
* **Notice Status (English)**: Expired
* **Notice Status (French)**: Expiré

### Contract Requirements

* **Service Category (UNSPSC)**: Dredging services (72141206)
* **Procurement Method (English)**: Competitive bidding
* **Procurement Method (French)**: Soumissionner à l'invite ouverte
* **Selection Criteria (English)**: Lowest Price
* **Selection Criteria (French)**: Prix le plus bas
* **Trade Agreements Involved**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity**:
	+ Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

* **Contact Person**:
	+ Nicole Fesseha, SPAC/PSPC
	+ Email: [nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

* **Notice URL (English)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18334983?extsite=MTgzMzQ5ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* **Notice URL (French)**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18334983?extsite=MTgzM
